alert.note: Alert for Branch (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Branch County through 830 PM EDT... At 800 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bronson, or 7 miles west of Coldwater, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coldwater, Bronson, Kinderhook, Batavia, Gilead, East Gilead, Marble Lake, Matteson Lake, Lake Of The Woods and Coldwater Lake. This includes Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
